name: IP_DEV_CAP_EDIT
description: This table displays device capture information.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the inpatient record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INST_START_EDIT_TM
columns.description: This column stores the old start time value from before the device start time was edited.

columns.name: INTERVAL_EDITED
columns.description: This item is used to store edited interval information.

columns.name: DEVICE_ID_EDITED
columns.description: This item is used to store device id for edited line.

columns.name: SEL_VAR_IDS_EDITED
columns.description: This item is used to store edited selected variables information.

columns.name: REMOVE_INST_EDIT_TM
columns.description: This item stores the edited stop instant for a device.

columns.name: RCRD_INST_EDIT_TM
columns.description: This item is used to store recorded instant for the event.

columns.name: REC_USER_ID_EDIT
columns.description: This item is used to store recorded user ID (edited data).

columns.name: REC_USER_ID_EDIT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LINKED_ORD_EDIT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the order associated with the edited device data.

columns.name: EDIT_SEC_ORD_ID
columns.description: Stores the secondary order id when second order is linked to the device (edited data).

columns.name: LINE_NUMBER_EDITED
columns.description: This item is used as a pointer to audit trail line. (edited data).

columns.name: EDIT_FLO_TEMPLAT_ID
columns.description: This item is used for saving audit trail information for flowsheet template.

columns.name: EDIT_FLO_TEMPLAT_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: DRCT_CPTR_INTER_ED
columns.description: Audit trail for Anesthesia direct capture interval, in minutes

columns.name: AUTOFILE_EFF_ED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which Auto Filing for this device association was enabled or disabled (as described in I INP 9360).

columns.name: AUTO_FILE_ED_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether device data is auto filed for old association
